title: Razor and blade
description: Sell the base product for free and make money on addons

title: Subscription
description: Charge a recurring fee on a periodic basis

title: Freemium
description: Offer a limited product for free, and charge for the rest of it

title: Pay per use
description: The customer pays on the basis of what he or she effectively consumes

title: Cross sell, Up sell
description: Generate revenue from additional products and offerings

title: Two sided market
description: A marketplace for buyers and sellers
